projects.title: SPITFIR(e)
projects.description: Denoising and deconvolution algorithm for 2D-3D-3D+t microscopy images. This deconvolution method is flexible and have been tested on WideField, Confocal, Lattice Light Sheet, MultiFocus, STED microscopy

projects.title: BioImage-IT
projects.description: BioImage-IT is an integrated solution for join data management and analysis for scientific experimentations

projects.title: SImgLib/SImgLibPy
projects.description: SImgLib is a c++ library that implement image processing algorithms for 3D+t analysis of microscopy images. It inlcudes multi-threaded and GPU implementations. SImgLibPy is a python wrapper (with cython) for SImgLib

projects.title: AiryscanJ
projects.description: AiryscanJ is a high resolution image reconstruction from array detector. High resolution images can be reconstructed by using detector linear combinations or deconvolution.

projects.title: Platform-Manager
projects.description: Platform-Manager is a web app (PHP, SQL, Javascript) for scientific facilities management. It include project management, equipements booking and metrology.

projects.title: Assessing skin lesion evolution from multispectral image sequences
projects.description: Machine learning and statistical algorithms to asses the skin lesion evolution in time series. This software is pattended and have been devoloped with Galderma R&D
